head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ROGALL, ARLENE FLIESCHMAN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ROGALL, ARLENE FLIESCHMAN

block.p: ROGALL-Arlene Flieschman on Friday, July 7, 2000. Of Maplewood, NJ. Wife of Herbert Rogall. Mother of Donna Rogall and Benjamin Rogall, M.D. Sister of Sonny Cohen. Visitation will be held at The Jacob A. Holle Funeral Home, 2122 Millburn Ave., Maplewood, New Jersey, on Saturday, July 8 from 7-9PM. Interment is at the convenience of the family.

Visitation will be held at The Jacob A. Holle Funeral Home, 2122 Millburn Ave., Maplewood, New Jersey, on Saturday, July 8 from 7-9PM. Interment is at the convenience of the family.
